sentences.sContent: Mr. Walker made his valedictory address after two years as chairman.
sentences.sCn: 在担任主席职务两年后，沃克先生发表了告别演说。

remMethod.val: vale (告别) + dict (说) + ory → 告别的

words.tran: 告别演说者；致告别辞者

trans.tranOther: A valedictory speech, letter, or performance is one that is intended as a way of saying goodbye when someone leaves another person, a place, or a job
a speech or statement in which you say goodbye when you are leaving a school, job etc, especially on a formal occasion
